```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F}
library(quantmod)
fredData <- list()
cnt <- 0
timseSeriesData <- 
  c(
    'EXJPUS','Japan / U.S. Foreign Exchange Rate',
    'Averages of daily figures. Noon buying rates in New York City for cable transfers payable in foreign currencies.',
    'EXUSEU','U.S. / Euro Foreign Exchange Rate',
    'Averages of daily figures. Noon buying rates in New York City for cable transfers payable in foreign currencies.',
    'EXUSUK','U.S. / U.K. Foreign Exchange Rate',
    'Averages of daily figures. Noon buying rates in New York City for cable transfers payable in foreign currencies.',
    'EXSFUS','South Africa / U.S. Foreign Exchange Rate',
    'Averages of daily figures. Noon buying rates in New York City for cable transfers payable in foreign currencies.'
  )
for (iii in seq(1, length(timseSeriesData), by = 3)) {
  cnt <- cnt + 1
  tmp <- getSymbols(timseSeriesData[iii], src = 'FRED', auto.assign = F)
  tmp <-
    data.frame(
      Date = as.Date(index(tmp)),
      tmp[, 1],
      check.names = F,
      row.names = NULL,
      stringsAsFactors = F
    )
  colnames(tmp)[2] <- timseSeriesData[iii + 1]
  fredData[[cnt]] <- tmp
  tail(fredData[[cnt]])
  if(iii == 1){allData <- tmp}else{allData <- merge(allData, tmp, by='Date', all=T)}
}
```
